features.description: Return EAP-Fail in Access-Reject, rather than an empty Access-Reject
Escape more strings in rlm_sql See http://www.freeradius.org/security.html
Don't send Proxy-State from home server in TTLS
Fixes for forking external programs, so the server doesn't suddenly stop processing requests, or stop forking programs
radzap now works, but it's command-line options have changed completely, and it's a shell script
radwho has updated command-line options, and no longer reads Unix "utmp" files
Fix bug in calling checkrad script with NAS port > 9999999
Fix long-standing bug when both crypt and pthreads are in use

summary: The focus of this release is stability
